hero.title: Manage all your finances with ease

incomes.title: Incomes
incomes.description: Monitor and analyze your income sources to easily identify trends and make better decisions that will accelerate the growth of your budget.

expenses.title: Expenses
expenses.description: Track and control your expenses to better manage your budget, avoid excessive costs, and optimize cash flow.

recurring-payments.title: Recurring Payments
recurring-payments.description: Manage your recurring payments to have full control over subscriptions, regular payments, and avoid unexpected charges.

banner.title: Take full control of your personal finances
